accept-auth-by-cert.help: Accept connections with unknown certificates and ask admin for approval.
accept-auth-by-cert.name: accept-auth-by-cert

options.help: Do not accept SSL connections with unknown certificates.
options.name: disable

options.help: Accept SSL connections without automatic certificate verification.
options.name: enable

options.help: Request verification by serial number.
options.name: serial

options.help: Request verification by certificate.
options.name: certificate

options.help: Synchronize configuration for IPAM, FortiAnalyzer, FortiSandbox, and Central Management to root node.
options.name: default

options.help: Do not synchronize configuration with root node.
options.name: local

downstream-access.help: Enable/disable downstream device access to this device's configuration and data.
downstream-access.name: downstream-access

options.help: Enable downstream device access to this device's configuration and data.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable downstream device access to this device's configuration and data.
options.name: disable

downstream-accprofile.help: Default access profile for requests from downstream devices.
downstream-accprofile.name: downstream-accprofile

configuration-write-access.help: Enable/disable downstream device write access to configuration.
configuration-write-access.name: configuration-write-access

options.help: Enable downstream device write access to configuration.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable downstream device write access to configuration.
options.name: disable

options.help: Global CMDB objects will be synchronized in Security Fabric.
options.name: default

options.help: Global CMDB objects will not be synchronized to and from this device.
options.name: local

fabric-workers.help: Number of worker processes for Security Fabric daemon.
fabric-workers.name: fabric-workers

options.help: Enable FortiCloud account ID matching for Security Fabric.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable FortiCloud accound ID matching for Security Fabric.
options.name: disable

group-name.help: Security Fabric group name. All FortiGates in a Security Fabric must have the same group name.
group-name.name: group-name

group-password.help: Security Fabric group password. All FortiGates in a Security Fabric must have the same group password.
group-password.name: group-password

log-unification.help: Enable/disable broadcast of discovery messages for log unification.
log-unification.name: log-unification

options.help: Disable broadcast of discovery messages for log unification.
options.name: disable

options.help: Enable broadcast of discovery messages for log unification.
options.name: enable

management-ip.help: Management IP address of this FortiGate. Used to log into this FortiGate from another FortiGate in the Security Fabric.
management-ip.name: management-ip

management-port.help: Overriding port for management connection (Overrides admin port).
management-port.name: management-port

options.help: SAML setting for fabric members is created by fabric root.
options.name: default

options.help: Do not apply SAML configuration generated by root.
options.name: local

options.help: Enable Security Fabric.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable Security Fabric.
options.name: disable

options.help: Accept authorization request.
options.name: accept

options.help: Deny authorization request.
options.name: deny

options.help: Verify downstream by serial number.
options.name: serial

options.help: Verify downstream by certificate.
options.name: certificate

downstream-authorization.help: Trust authorizations by this node's administrator.
downstream-authorization.name: downstream-authorization

options.help: Enable downstream authorization.
options.name: enable

options.help: Disable downstream authorization.
options.name: disable

trusted-list.help: Pre-authorized and blocked security fabric nodes.
trusted-list.name: trusted-list

upstream.help: IP/FQDN of the FortiGate upstream from this FortiGate in the Security Fabric.
upstream.name: upstream

upstream-ip.help: IP address of the FortiGate upstream from this FortiGate in the Security Fabric.
upstream-ip.name: upstream-ip

upstream-port.help: The port number to use to communicate with the FortiGate upstream from this FortiGate in the Security Fabric (default = 8013).
upstream-port.name: upstream-port

results.help: Add this FortiGate to a Security Fabric or set up a new Security Fabric on this FortiGate.
results.name: csf
